option.name: content
option.value: Avoid overly verbose descriptions or unnecessary details. Start with a short sentence in imperative form, no more than 50 characters long. Before message add a conventional commit prefix. Then leave an empty line and continue with a more detailed explanation. Write only one sentence for the first part, and two or three sentences at most for the detailed explanation. Write each feature or fix description on the next line and begin with an asterisk to appear in markdown mode as a dotted list.

list.name: Changes
list.comment:
chore: Add IDE configuration files
* Added .idea/.gitignore to ignore IDE-specific files. * Included workspace changes and updated component settings. * Added new configuration for project styles in Project.xml.

task.summary: Default task

Add IDE, Docker, and config files
Included new .idea configuration files for various settings such as web resources, Symfony, and PHPSpec. Added comprehensive .dockerignore and a new Dockerfile.Expanded workspace settings and watcher tasks to support SCSS and other configurations.

chore: remove unused user and group configuration
Removed sudo and gosu from package list to streamline the Docker image. Eliminated unused arguments and environment variables related to user configuration. * Removed USER and GROUP arguments and environment variables. * Deleted user creation and permission-related commands. * Cleaned up .idea/workspace.xml configuration file.

feat: update data source configuration
Renamed data source attributes and updated grants to new user 'app'. Changed default casing to 'lower/lower', and server version to '10.11.9'. Re-assigned schema and table associations to the new data source.

feat: enhance logging and Docker configuration
Enhanced logging functionality and improved Dockerfile and Docker Compose setup. * Introduced `parseUnits` method for log file size parsing. * Refined `SugarLogger`, `LoggerManager`, and `LoggerTemplate` classes. * Modified `Dockerfile.Apache` to use Node 18 and updated PHP configs. * Added synchronization options to `compose.yaml` and improved database settings. * Updated `composer.json` and `composer.lock` to include `ext-mysqli`.
fix: logger corrections and Dockerfile changes
fix:: log level

fix: logging format and string handling adjustments
* Adjust logger format to include brackets and hyphen. * Correct string handling in SugarLogger by replacing array_shift with join. * Update .idea configuration to remove obsolete entries.

fix: Taken from develop branch
* Adjusted white space and indentation in multiple PHP and TS files. * Commented out configurations in .env and updated composer settings. * Added detailed file-level comments for autoloading. * Enhanced error handling and logging in console script.

chore: Remove index.ts file
The index.ts file has been deleted, removing all exports. * This cleanup may be necessary for project restructuring or refactoring. * Ensuring all exports are managed directly from their respective modules can improve maintainability.

fix: Update php.ini display_errors setting and fix XML
* Change php.ini display_errors setting from stdout to Off to enhance error visibility management. * Update .idea workspace.xml to reflect updated timestamp and new task details. * Add legacy vendor paths in PHP include path configuration.

chore(deps): Update composer dependencies and config
Update composer dependencies to latest versions and modify configuration files for enhanced stability and performance.
* Bump versions for various dependencies in composer.json. * Reflect changes in .idea/workspace.xml to align with updated settings.

chore(deps): Update composer dependencies and config
Update composer dependencies to latest versions and modify configuration files for enhanced stability and performance. * Bump versions for various dependencies in composer.json. * Reflect changes in .idea/workspace.xml to align with updated settings. * Add phpunit.phar to .gitignore.

chore(deps): Update composer and package dependencies
Update composer dependencies to latest versions and adjust configurations.
* Bump versions for multiple dependencies in composer.json. * Update .idea/workspace.xml to reflect configuration changes. * Remove obsolete dependencies from composer.json. * Adjust package.json dependencies.

fix: Improve LoggerManager and update database collations
Refactor LoggerManager for style and method content consistency. * Changed `die` to `exit` for better clarity. * Standardized require_once formatting to use no parentheses. * Applied consistent punctuation and spacing in comments.
Replace database collations with simplified entries. * Removed redundant charset entries. * Ensured consistency and more precise charset configurations.

feat: Update inspection tools, PhpCSFixer, and core packages
Add and configure various inspection tools and warnings. Update PhpCSFixer configuration with additional standards. Modify core packages for Angular and tslib dependencies. * Added multiple inspection tools to Project_Default.xml. * Updated PhpCSFixer standards in php.xml. * Adjusted package.json dependencies for Angular and tslib.

refactor: correct spacing and formatting issues
Updated various files to correct spacing and formatting inconsistencies.
* Fixed inconsistent use of spaces around assignment and concatenation operators. * Removed unnecessary blank lines and added missing ones. * Ensured consistent indentation across all updated files.

chore: add new data source schema metadata file
Added a new metadata file for the data source schema in the project. * Facilitates better management of data schema by IDE. * Ensures smoother project synchronization and sharing.

chore: add new data source schema metadata file
Added a new metadata file for the data source schema to improve IDE management and project synchronization. * Facilitates better management of data schema by IDE. * Ensures smoother project synchronization and sharing. ```

feat: Add DatabasePDOManager for PDO database operations
Introduces a new DatabasePDOManager class for managing PDO connections and interactions. * Implements singleton pattern for instance management. * Includes methods for connecting to database, executing queries, and logging. * Ensures proper error handling and logging throughout.

feat: Add DatabasePDOManager and update .gitignore
Introduces DatabasePDOManager class for managing PDO operations. * Implements singleton pattern and provides methods for database interactions. * Updates .gitignore with additional cache, log, and build directories. * Ensures better organization and efficiency in project management.

chore: Add IDE configuration files
* Added .idea/.gitignore to ignore IDE-specific files. * Included workspace changes and updated component settings. * Added new configuration for project styles in Project.xml.

MESSAGE.value:
Add IDE, Docker, and config files
Included new .idea configuration files for various settings such as web resources, Symfony, and PHPSpec. Added comprehensive .dockerignore and a new Dockerfile.Expanded workspace settings and watcher tasks to support SCSS and other configurations.

Remove user-specific configurations from Dockerfile
Eliminated sudo and gosu packages and removed user and group settings to simplify the Dockerfile. This reduces unnecessary complexity and potential security vulnerabilities associated with user permissions. Additionally, updated IDE project files with relevant configurations.

chore: remove unused user and group configuration
Removed sudo and gosu from package list to streamline the Docker image. Eliminated unused arguments and environment variables related to user configuration. * Removed USER and GROUP arguments and environment variables. * Deleted user creation and permission-related commands. * Cleaned up .idea/workspace.xml configuration file.

feat: update data source configuration
Renamed data source attributes and updated grants to new user 'app'. Changed default casing to 'lower/lower', and server version to '10.11.9'. Re-assigned schema and table associations to the new data source.

fix: update Dockerfile, compose, and db scripts for consistency
* Update base node image in Dockerfile to node:18-bookworm. * Add display_errors and error_log settings in PHP configuration. * Ensure proper ownership of Apache log directory. * Include `ext-mysqli` in composer.json and composer.lock for proper dependency. * Add development file sync configuration in compose.yaml. * Change database user references to app_user in compose.yaml and SQL script.

feat: enhance logging and Docker configuration
Enhanced logging functionality and improved Dockerfile and Docker Compose setup. * Introduced `parseUnits` method for log file size parsing. * Refined `SugarLogger`, `LoggerManager`, and `LoggerTemplate` classes. * Modified `Dockerfile.Apache` to use Node 18 and updated PHP configs. * Added synchronization options to `compose.yaml` and improved database settings. * Updated `composer.json` and `composer.lock` to include `ext-mysqli`.
fix: logger corrections and Dockerfile changes
fix:: log level

fix: logging format and string handling adjustments
* Adjust logger format to include brackets and hyphen. * Correct string handling in SugarLogger by replacing array_shift with join. * Update .idea configuration to remove obsolete entries.

fix: Taken from develop branch
* Adjusted white space and indentation in multiple PHP and TS files. * Commented out configurations in .env and updated composer settings. * Added detailed file-level comments for autoloading. * Enhanced error handling and logging in console script.

chore: Remove index.ts file
The index.ts file has been deleted, removing all exports. * This cleanup may be necessary for project restructuring or refactoring. * Ensuring all exports are managed directly from their respective modules can improve maintainability.

fix: Update php.ini display_errors setting and fix XML
* Change php.ini display_errors setting from stdout to Off to enhance error visibility management. * Update .idea workspace.xml to reflect updated timestamp and new task details. * Add legacy vendor paths in PHP include path configuration.

chore(deps): Update composer dependencies and config
Update composer dependencies to latest versions and modify configuration files for enhanced stability and performance.
* Bump versions for various dependencies in composer.json. * Reflect changes in .idea/workspace.xml to align with updated settings.

Update composer dependencies to latest versions and modify configuration files for enhanced stability and performance. * Bump versions for various dependencies in composer.json. * Reflect changes in .idea/workspace.xml to align with updated settings. * Add phpunit.phar to .gitignore.

chore(deps): Update composer and package dependencies
Update composer dependencies to latest versions and adjust configurations.
* Bump versions for multiple dependencies in composer.json. * Update .idea/workspace.xml to reflect configuration changes. * Remove obsolete dependencies from composer.json. * Adjust package.json dependencies.

fix: Improve LoggerManager and update database collations
Refactor LoggerManager for style and method content consistency. * Changed `die` to `exit` for better clarity. * Standardized require_once formatting to use no parentheses. * Applied consistent punctuation and spacing in comments.
Replace database collations with simplified entries. * Removed redundant charset entries. * Ensured consistency and more precise charset configurations.

feat: Update inspection tools, PhpCSFixer, and core packages
Add and configure various inspection tools and warnings. Update PhpCSFixer configuration with additional standards. Modify core packages for Angular and tslib dependencies. * Added multiple inspection tools to Project_Default.xml. * Updated PhpCSFixer standards in php.xml. * Adjusted package.json dependencies for Angular and tslib.

refactor: correct spacing and formatting issues
Updated various files to correct spacing and formatting inconsistencies.
* Fixed inconsistent use of spaces around assignment and concatenation operators. * Removed unnecessary blank lines and added missing ones. * Ensured consistent indentation across all updated files.

chore: add new data source schema metadata file
Added a new metadata file for the data source schema in the project. * Facilitates better management of data schema by IDE. * Ensures smoother project synchronization and sharing.

chore: add new data source schema metadata file
Added a new metadata file for the data source schema to improve IDE management and project synchronization. * Facilitates better management of data schema by IDE. * Ensures smoother project synchronization and sharing. ```

feat: Add DatabasePDOManager for PDO database operations
Introduces a new DatabasePDOManager class for managing PDO connections and interactions. * Implements singleton pattern for instance management. * Includes methods for connecting to database, executing queries, and logging. * Ensures proper error handling and logging throughout.

Introduces DatabasePDOManager class for managing PDO operations. * Implements singleton pattern and provides methods for database interactions. * Updates .gitignore with additional cache, log, and build directories. * Ensures better organization and efficiency in project management.

* Added .idea/.gitignore to ignore IDE-specific files. * Included workspace changes and updated component settings. * Added new configuration for project styles in Project.xml.
